attributes.action: accept climate change as an inevitability, stop attempting to prevent it, and prepare Britain for the changes it will undergo in the future
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is time we stop "fighting the tide" trying to prevent climate change (for expamle by constantly taxing high emmissions vehicals), now we must enbrace the inevitable and furthermore prepare our nation for a future of a lower availability of fossil fuels, rising sea levels and a changing climate. By diverting efforts away from prevention and towards  renewable/nuclear energy and preparing infastructure for the well publicised rise in sea levels.
